codeSystems.name: CaregiverGASFollowupVS
codeSystems.title: Caregiver Follow-Up GAS Score
codeSystems.description: The caregiver follow-up score indicates how the caregiver rated either the patient's progress or their own progress on goal attainment scaling.

codeSystems.name: PatientGASFollowupVS
codeSystems.title: Patient Follow-Up GAS Score
codeSystems.description: The patient follow-up score indicates how the patient rated their own progress on goal attainment scaling.

codeSystems.name: PractitionerGASFollowupVS
codeSystems.title: Practitioner Follow-Up GAS Score
codeSystems.description: The practitioner follow-up score indicates how the practitioner rated the patient's progress on goal attainment scaling.
